entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 10 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning and early this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 10 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon.
